title: Miracolul Plantelor
description: A health food chain store located in the city center is the biggest store out of the other outlets around the city. in the area. Carries nuts and seeds, beverages, chocolates & snacks, vitamins and supplements, organic vegetables, cereals and rice, a wide selection of teas, cooking oils, cosmetics and detergents; pretty much everything for the household. Stocks plenty of vegan products including vegetable milks, a wide assortment of deli goodies (salami, spreads, tofu, wheat products), raw foods and snacks, organic items, cosmetics and detergents, and a lot more. Affordable prices and convenient location. If you live in the city ask for the free membership card that gives you a 5% or 10% discount. Please note that they also sell meat and dairy products.
